attributes.review: I downloaded the app and got hacked I got. Call stating that I had to vote for trump to get my data back. So I have to vote or else. Oh and they also said that if I tell anyone that I will be deported!
This app is so glitchy. It promises to do things it cannot do. It’s embarrassing. Worst app I ever downloaded. Do you have to have baby hands to get it to work right?
attributes.title: Baby Hands App

attributes.review: This app does NOT deliver oranges to your house.😡 I downloaded this because it says it can raise awareness for orange sales and had a picture of an orange on the front. But you get nothing in return🙄🙄
attributes.title: Misleading😢

attributes.review:
Trump quotes:
-“There has to be some form of punishment (for a woman wanting an abortion)”
-“I’ll supply the funds and she’ll take care of the kids.”
-“You’re (women) going to make the same if you do as good as a job.”
-“It (maternity leave) is an inconvenience for a person running a business.” 
-“Grab them (women) by the p****”

And people still want to vote for him? A vote for Trump is a vote for sexism racism and homophobia.
attributes.title: Crooked and Nasty App

attributes.review: The app just radiates RACISM AND HATRED . me, a fellow positive, loving, caring, and INTELLIGENT human being just hates to see things like this🥺🥺🥺please please PLEASE rid of it immediately. we can use the internet and newspapers to learn what’s going on around us, not this ole thing❤️.
attributes.title: DISGUSTING HORRIBLE
